```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets)

library(plotly)
```

```{r}
data(rest_inspec)

set.seed(1)

rest_inspec_df = 
  rest_inspec %>%
  filter(.data = ., boro != "Missing", score != "NA", grade != "NA") %>%
  sample_n(5000)
```

Column {data-width=650}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart A

```{r}
rest_inspec_df %>%
  group_by(boro) %>%
  mutate(.data = ., as.factor(grade)) %>%
  count(grade) %>%
  filter(.data = ., n != "NA") %>%
  plot_ly(x = ~reorder(boro, -n), y = ~n, color = ~grade, type = "bar")
```


Column {data-width=350}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Distribution of violation codes by cuisine type in Brooklyn, New York

```{r}
rest_inspec_df %>%
  group_by(boro, grade, score) %>%
  count(violation_code) %>%
  arrange(desc(n)) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  plot_ly(x = ~boro, y = ~n, type = "box", color = ~grade) 
```

### Distribution of health inspection scores (A,B,C) among restaurants in New York City

```{r}
rest_inspec_df %>%
  filter(.data = ., grade == "A" | grade == "B" | grade == "C") %>%
  plot_ly(x = ~boro, y = ~score, type = "box", color = ~grade) %>% layout(boxmode = "group")
```
